most_active_tickets.title: Ollama Fails to Install on Linux

common_issues.title: Ollama Installation Failure on Linux
common_issues.description: Users reported an immediate "Ollama failed to install" dialog on Linux (Pieces OS 11.0.0) when clicking the install button within the Pieces desktop app.  The error message "404 Publisher Model not found" suggests an issue with Pieces accessing the required model for installation.  Further investigation into model access and installation process is needed.

related_issues.title: Ollama Fails to Install on Linux
related_issues.text:
Ollama Fails to Install on Linux
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

User reports immediate "Ollama failed to install" diaglog upon clicking install Ollama install button in Pieces desktop app
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate the "404 Publisher Model not found" error encountered during Ollama installation on Linux (Pieces OS 11.0.0). Verify model access and the installation process.
Prioritize resolution of the Ollama installation issue due to its impact on Linux users and its high activity level.
Monitor incoming support tickets for similar Ollama installation failures to gauge the issue's prevalence.
